mapper.select: SELECT CNUM,FK_MID,MNAME,MPHONE,MEMAIL,CSELECT1,CSELECT2, CSELECT3,CSELECT4,CTITLE,CCONTENT,CFILE FROM (SELECT ROWNUM NUM,N.* FROM (SELECT * FROM COMMUMEMBERS ORDER BY CNUM DESC) N) WHERE NUM BETWEEN #{param1} AND #{param2}
SELECT MID,MNAME,MPHONE,MEMAIL FROM MEMBERS WHERE MID=#{param1}
SELECT CNUM,FK_MID,MNAME,MPHONE,MEMAIL,CSELECT1,CSELECT2,CSELECT3,CSELECT4,CTITLE,CCONTENT,CFILE FROM COMMUMEMBERS WHERE MID=#{param1} AND FK_MID = MID ORDER BY CNUM DESC
